completed_steps.summary: Classified as monorepo with 6 parts: server(backend), frontend(web), remote-frontend(web), remote(backend), npx-cli(cli), shared(library)
Discovered existing documentation: README.md, AGENTS.md, CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md, frontend/CLAUDE.md, crates/remote/README.md, npx-cli/README.md, docs/docs-vibe-kanban/ (previous quick scan)
Tech stack analyzed: Rust nightly (Axum, Tokio, SQLx), TypeScript (React 18, Vite 5, TailwindCSS, Zustand), 95+ frontend deps, 44 migrations

Deep scan of all 6 parts via parallel agents: server (10 crates, 50+ endpoints, 16 tables), frontend (90+ components, 25 contexts, 5 stores), remote (60+ endpoints, 25+ tables, JWT auth), remote-frontend, shared, npx-cli
Source tree analysis written with annotations for all 6 parts, integration diagrams, and critical directory tables

Generated 7 docs via 5 parallel agents: development-guide.md (936 lines), architecture.md (1119 lines), project-overview.md (330 lines), api-contracts.md (598 lines), data-models.md (650 lines), component-inventory.md (535 lines), integration-architecture.md (1329 lines)
Master index generated with navigation for all 8 generated docs, existing docs, architectural patterns table, and getting started guide
Validation passed: no incomplete markers, no TODO/FIXME/PLACEHOLDER issues, all 11 output files verified on disk

findings.rust_backend_scan: Complete deep scan of all 10 Rust crates. See docs-vibe-kanban/rust-backend-deep-scan.json
findings.frontend_scan: 220+ components, Container/View pattern, 5 Zustand stores, 25 Contexts, 13 API namespaces
findings.remote_scan: 60+ endpoints, 25+ PostgreSQL tables, JWT + AES-256-GCM auth, Stripe billing, GitHub App
findings.source_tree: Documented with integration diagrams and critical directory tables

resume_instructions: All 12 steps complete. Deep scan documentation finalized with 11 output files (6066+ lines total).
